content:
TV shopping doesn't really appeal to me that much,
unless they're selling the latest telescopes, or star charts,
or... well, okay, maybe I am a little excited about it.

I rarely feel anxious about unfamiliar places,
perhaps because I've traveled so much in the past,

However, <color=#8AAB4B>{homestar} Road</color>

was the first world bubble I decided to call home.

Could it be...
(Happy) Is there a special discount?

I got lucky that day and found just what I wanted at Glenn's shop.
After I counted out the money to pay,
Glenn quietly returned half of it to me.
